name: Matlab Engine
description:
Matlab RPG engine. No real game, but youre able to walk around. Cant play unless you have matlab, but made a short video. Dont mind lag, its from my pc

All coded this week:

Image support

Tiles

Player sprite sheet processing

Animated walk cycle

Animated menu

Pause menu

Escape closes the game

All assets made this week (except one bedroom image from gotopast)
